# 🌟 IGIT Horizon 2025 🌟

![IGIT Horizon](https://i.imgur.com/wSgJIVt.png)

## 🚀 About IGIT Horizon

IGIT Horizon is the premier annual technical fest of **Indira Gandhi Institute of Technology (IGIT), Sarang**. It brings together tech enthusiasts, innovators, and creators to showcase their talents, engage in exciting competitions, and participate in hands-on workshops.

Join us as we **Follow the Horizon 2K25** and explore new frontiers in technology and innovation!

📢 Stay updated by following our WhatsApp Channel:

🔗 [Follow the Horizon 2k25](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb42HaE3AzNPXcDPdu0s)

---

## 🎯 Join the Horizon Technical Team!

If you're passionate about technology and want to be part of the **Horizon Technical Team**, now is your chance! Fill out the form below before **January 31st** to apply:

📌 **Application Form:**

🔗 [Technical Team Registration](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSePCzTaLjyJdAwXNByDGt9e0cyWSQHV_wpFTZI_4UWDK3MsLA/viewform?usp=dialog)

📝 **Deadline:** January 31, 2025

📩 Regards,

Horizon Technical Lead

---

## 🤝 Join the Sponsorship Team!

We're looking for dynamic individuals to join the **Sponsorship Team** for Horizon 2025! If you're interested in securing partnerships and sponsorships for the event, fill out the form below before **January 30th**.

📌 **Application Form:**

🔗 [Sponsorship Team Registration](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSckN6ls2wfQNganL4lXpxwuoYZZGg1Z77v8LOSVzNdTYywZeQ/viewform?usp=header)

📝 **Deadline:** January 30, 2025

📩 Regards,

Horizon Team

---

🌟 **Be a part of something bigger. Follow the Horizon!** 🚀
